UnitDefinition.Name: Unit variability correlation types
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted Unit variability correlation types. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: No correlation
Unit.Description: The unit residue values for unit portions (consumption amount/unitweight) are randomly drawn, explicitly ignoring any correlation between unit residues.

Unit.Name: Full correlation
Unit.Description: The unit residue values for unit portions (consumption amount/unitweight) are randomly drawn, explicitly introducing correlation between unit residues, e.g. high (small) values occur more frequently together.
